header.title: Python Programming
header.description: Learn Python programming from basics to advanced. Master syntax, data structures, and more.

firstHeadingDescription: Dive deep into Python, one of the most versatile programming languages.
overview: This course covers Python programming fundamentals—from variables and data types to functions and libraries. Perfect for beginners and aspiring developers.
whatYouWillLearn: Working with libraries like NumPy and Pandas

outline.title: Introduction to Python
outline.subTitle1Content: Understand variables, data types, and basic syntax.

outline.title: Intermediate Python
outline.subTitle1Content: Learn to write functions and use modules.
outline.subTitle2Content: Explore lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets.

outline.title: Advanced Concepts
outline.subTitle1Content: Dive into classes, objects, and exception handling.
outline.subTitle2Content: An introduction to popular Python libraries.

outline.title: Project and Best Practices
outline.subTitle1Content: Apply your skills in hands-on projects.
outline.subTitle2Content: Learn how to optimize code and debug effectively.

header.title: Generative AI
header.description: Explore the capabilities of Generative AI. Learn to design models that create text, images, and more.

firstHeading: Unlock the Power of Generative AI
firstHeadingDescription: Build AI models that generate creative content.
overview: This course introduces the fundamentals of Generative AI, covering model architectures and real-world applications.

outline.title: Building Models

outline.title: Advanced Techniques
outline.subTitle1Content: Techniques to improve model performance.

outline.title: Ethics and Deployment
outline.subTitle1Content: Discuss ethics in AI development.

header.description: Dive into machine learning algorithms and techniques to build predictive models and solve real-world problems.

firstHeadingDescription: Learn the essential algorithms and data processing techniques.
overview: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to machine learning including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning methods.

outline.subTitle2Content: Apply your skills in practical projects.
